text: Jorge Alberto Sassi (17 November 1947 - 9 February 2015) was an Argentine actor. He was known for his roles in Valientes, Heartbreakers, and A dos aguas. Sassi was born in Rafaela, Santa Fe, Argentina. Sassi died of renal failure at his home in Buenos Aires, Argentina, aged 67.Muri√≥ el actor Jorge Sassi ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1947 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from renal failure Category:Argentine movie actors Category:Actors from Buenos Aires
